mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.name AS "name", a.type AS "type", a.area AS "area", a.address AS "address", a.user_id AS "user.id", a.user_name AS "userName", a.phone AS "phone", a.employees AS "employees", a.aunts AS "aunts", a.service_point AS "servicePoint", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.office_id AS "office.id", a.office_name AS "officeName", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.addr_province_id AS "addrProvinceId", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.addr_city_id AS "addrCityId", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.addr_district_id AS "addrDistrictId", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.addr_province_name AS "addrProvinceName", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.addr_city_name AS "addrCityName", a.addr_district_name AS "addrDistrictName", a.addr_detail_info AS "addrDetailInfo", a.radius AS "radius", a.circle_center AS "circleCenter", a.range_type AS "rangeType", a.useable AS "useable", u6.name AS "user.name", o13.name AS "office.name", o13.service_area_type as "office.serviceAreaType"
LEFT JOIN sys_user u6 ON u6.id = a.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_office o13 ON o13.id = a.office_id
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM basic_service_station WHERE del_flag = 0 AND user_id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO basic_service_station( id, name, type, area, address, user_id, user_name, phone, employees, aunts, service_point, create_by, office_id, office_name, create_date, addr_province_id, update_by, addr_city_id, update_date, addr_district_id, remarks, addr_province_name, del_flag, addr_city_name, addr_district_name, addr_detail_info, radius, circle_center, range_type, useable ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{type}, #{area}, #{address}, #{user.id}, #{userName}, #{phone}, #{employees}, #{aunts}, #{servicePoint}, #{createBy.id}, #{office.id}, #{officeName}, #{createDate}, #{addrProvinceId}, #{updateBy.id}, #{addrCityId}, #{updateDate}, #{addrDistrictId}, #{remarks}, #{addrProvinceName}, #{delFlag}, #{addrCityName}, #{addrDistrictName}, #{addrDetailInfo}, #{radius}, #{circleCenter}, #{rangeType}, #{useable} )
